summary: REQ-20/REQ-21/REQ-23 appear to be implemented via expanded No-button labels and feedback pools, an intensity-scaled celebration overlay with reduced-motion handling, and new CSS animation keyframes/hooks. REQ-22 (adding the required generated Valentine images under frontend/public/assets/generated and referencing them from the frontend) is not evidenced in the diff because no new image files were added.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add additional Valentine-themed static visual assets (new generated images) stored under `frontend/public/assets/generated` and referenced directly from the frontend via `/assets/generated/...`.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added files, so the required new generated images (stickers set, heart garland banner, love note paper texture) are not present under `frontend/public/assets/generated`, and there is no evidence of direct `/assets/generated/...` references to newly added assets.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (claims new decorative images, but no corresponding added image assets are shown in the diff)
